function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffectively quarantined cases in the crowds","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 due to undetected cases","Mitigation":"Improving quarantine measures and increasing testing capacity","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, rapid testing kits","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Limitation in the number of medical beds","Impact":"Full capacity of medical beds leading to inadequate care for infected individuals","Mitigation":"Increasing the number of medical beds, optimizing hospital resource allocation","Technologies":"Hospital management software, temporary hospital facilities","People":"Infected individuals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government"}]}
